mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, m.nickname, m.my_team_code, t.name_kr AS myTeamName, -- [승요력 계산] -- 1. diaries와 games를 game_id로 조인 -- 2. 게임의 승리팀(winning_team)이 회원의 응원팀(my_team_code)과 같으면 승리(1)로 카운트 -- 3. (승리 횟수 / 전체 유효 경기 수) * 100 = 승률(%) (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN g.winning_team = m.my_team_code THEN 1 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0) * 100), 0) FROM diaries d JOIN games g ON d.game_id = g.game_id WHERE d.member_id = m.member_id AND g.cancel_reason IS NULL AND g.winning_team IS NOT NULL) AS winRate, -- 맞팔 여부 확인 EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM follows f2 WHERE f2.follower_id = m.member_id AND f2.following_id = #{myMemberId}) AS isMutual FROM follows f JOIN members m ON f.following_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN teams t ON m.my_team_code = t.team_code WHERE f.follower_id = #{myMemberId} ORDER BY f.created_at DESC

SELECT m.member_id, m.nickname, m.my_team_code, t.name_kr AS myTeamName, -- [승요력 계산] 동일 로직 적용 (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN g.winning_team = m.my_team_code THEN 1 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0) * 100), 0) FROM diaries d JOIN games g ON d.game_id = g.game_id WHERE d.member_id = m.member_id AND g.cancel_reason IS NULL AND g.winning_team IS NOT NULL) AS winRate, -- 내가 이 사람을 팔로우 중인지 확인 (맞팔 여부이자 버튼 상태) EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM follows f2 WHERE f2.follower_id = #{myMemberId} AND f2.following_id = m.member_id) AS isFollowing FROM follows f JOIN members m ON f.follower_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN teams t ON m.my_team_code = t.team_code WHERE f.following_id = #{myMemberId} ORDER BY f.created_at DESC
